Package population

Class Population

java.lang.Object
population.Population
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, PopulationInterface
public class Population extends Object implements PopulationInterface, Observer
The Population class manages a collection of Individual objects within a population. It provides methods for manipulating and retrieving information about these individuals, such as adding, removing, and modifying their distributions, as well as computing and tracking comfort levels and optimal solutions.

      number_of_planetary_systems - Number of planetary systems.
      number_of_patrols - Number of patrols.
      cost_matrix - Matrix of patrol times.

    • create_priority_queue

      private PriorityQueue<Individual> create_priority_queue(Integer size)
      Creates a fixed size priority queue with the best individuals of the current set of individuals.
      Parameters:
      size - Desired size of the priority queue.
      Returns:
      Priority queue containing the best current living individuals, all the individuals have different distributions
